hero.heading: charmayne is a product designer, growth marketer, and builder
hero.bio: with 0 to 1 experience in product & GTM. Founding designer and employee #4 at HeyMax who helped scale to 6M+ ARR in SEA. Building at the edges. Based in Singapore (now SF) but hardly stays put.

projects.title: Building Sidi: a tool for serious Chinese learners
